translatedResources.title: Open Source Hardware Checklist
translatedResources.subtitle: Make sure your project is heading in the right direction!

shortDescription.shortDescription: This checklist is made up from key points of the Open Source Hardware Definition and Best Practices for a quick reference guide to ensure your project is being properly labeled as Open Source Hardware.
